item.title: Hugo A Fast and Flexible Website Generator
item.description: Quick Start Guide Hugo download https://github.com/gohugoio/hugo/releases Install Hugo https://gohugo.io/getting-started/installing/ Create a blog folder hugo new site blog go in to the blog folder and modify config.toml for your github url baseURL = "https://<your-github-account>.github.io/" create new page hugo new about.md create new post hugo new post/first.md install a theme cd themes git clone https://github.
